query:
SELECT 
                COALESCE(SUM(
                    CASE WHEN c.is_income THEN t.amount 
                    ELSE -t.amount 
                    END
                ), 0) as "balance!"
            FROM transactions t
            JOIN categories c ON t.category_id = c.id
            WHERE t.user_id = $1 AND t.pocket_id = $2 AND t.deleted_at IS NULL
